tweets.html:

tweets.html:
Can #Newsroom only last one episode and then turn into #SportsNight and bring back all the original cast and add Bradley Whitford 'K thanks

OK, watch #Newsroom or don't. Like or don't. But please, for the love of man, just shut the eff up about it already.
